com.jaxson.lib.gdx.backend

Class DisplayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxson.lib.gdx.util.GameObject
      • com.jaxson.lib.gdx.backend.DisplayManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Pauseable, Renderable

    public class DisplayManager
extends GameObject
    A class that handles the display and rendering. Contains the Camera, Viewport, SpriteBatch, ModelBatch.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaxson Van Doorn
